import React, {useContext, useEffect, useState} from 'react' import {GlobalState} from '../../../GlobalState' import Loading from '../utils/Loading/Loading' import Image from '../../headers/icon/profile.svg' import './profile.css' import axios from 'axios' function Profile() { const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [userId] = state.userAPI.userId const [Token] = state.userAPI.token const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const [profile, setProfile] = useState([]) useEffect(() =>{ const getUser = async () =>{ const res = await axios.get(`/api/customer/${userId}`, { headers: {Authorization: Token} }) setProfile(res.data) } getUser() }) if(loading) return
return ( <> {profile.length !==0 &&
